attributes.action: make a pledge to eradicate poverty in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are many things that can be done to eradicate child poverty that would
also have a positive impact on all people living in poverty. These include;
tackling the gender pay gap and the concentration of women in low paid, part
time work, expanding affordable childcare, the government taking a lead in
putting Living Wage Agreements in place, a massive expansion in social
housing to address the housing crisis and soaring housing costs. We also
need to look at all the barriers people experience to taking part in
employment, this includes tackling discrimination – minority ethnic
communities remain disproportionately affected by poverty. It also must be
recognised that asylum seekers need support, not stigmatising. These are
just starting points, and I believe that we do need a serious discussion-
which includes the voices of those living in poverty and fully involves all
members of the local community.
